metadata.title: CVE-2022-1962 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Uncontrolled recursion in the Parse functions in go/parser before Go1.17.12 and Go 1.18.4 allow an attacker to cause a panic due to stackexhaustion via deeply nested types or declarations.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1962` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.18 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2
golang-1.18-go - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2
golang-1.18-src - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.18 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2').
